name: HSP_DEATH_STATUS
description: The HSP_DEATH_STATUS table contains information on the death status of inpatients.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient with this legal status.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the legal status for the patient.

columns.name: DEATH_LEGAL_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the legal status for the patient.
